title: So I've spend around 250 doller so far alone on hex tech chest ...
body: And .... I got  3 gems :D, seriously though I'm not gonna qq and say oh are gems too rare I was just wondering what is the average amount people spend for 10 gems.

replies.body:
ive turned about 20+ into chest and keys so far

and i still managed to get soulstealer vayne lol
i know... i dont even play vayne {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

I've got 3 gems.

Haven't spent anything on chests as far as I remember.
Well, obviously you dont play mobile phone gacha type games. 250$ is chicken feed :D

I have never bought a chest, except for one bundle that came with a gem.
I have never missed a weekly chest _(i've gotten every single one so far since they came out)_

I have 2 gems.

I foresee no crafting exclusive skins in my future....

Maybe in a year or two ill have enough for a ward?
So when Rito says "FREE SKINS" they actually mean, you gotta work your ass off for the next 3 years for it >:)
